<!-- Hello -->
|vo_01_01_title      = 첫 만남・과거
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello: The Past
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello - The Past.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx         = 난 사이노. 한때 「대풍기관」이었고, 지금은 내 힘으로 죄악을 심판하고 있어. 너도 규칙과 정의를 위해 싸우고 있다면, 내 힘을 빌려줄게
|vo_01_01_rm         = Nan Saino. Hanttae "Daepunggigwan"ieotgo, jigeumeun nae himeuro joeageul simpanhago isseo. Neodo gyuchikgwa jeong'uireul wihae ssaugo itdamyeon, nae himeul billyeojulge
|vo_01_01_tl         = I'm Cyno. I was once the "General Mahamatra", and now I judge sins by my own power. If you are also fighting for the rules and justice, I'll borrow you my power.

|vo_01_02_title      = 첫 만남・현재
|vo_01_02_subtitle   = Hello: The Present
|vo_01_02_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_01_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello - The Present.ogg
|vo_01_02_tx         = 난 아카데미아의 「대풍기관」 사이노야. 규칙을 수호하고 죄악을 심판하는 것이 내 의무지. 앞으로의 여행에서 내가 널 안전하게 지킬 거야
|vo_01_02_rm         = Nan Akademia-ui "Daepunggigwan" Sainoya. Gyuchigeul suhohago joeageul simpanhaneul geosi nae uimuji. Apeuroui yeohaeng'eseo naega neol anjeonhage jikil geoya
|vo_01_02_tl         = I'm Cyno, the "General Mahamatra" of the Akademiya. It is my duty to protect the rules and judge sins. I'll keep you safe in the travels from now.

<!-- Chats -->
|vo_02_01_title      = 잡담・무게
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Weighing the Heart
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Weighing the Heart.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx         = 선과 악은 결국 그 무게를 저울질하게 되어있어
|vo_02_01_rm         = Seongwa ageun gyeolguk geu mugereul jeouljilhage doeeoisseo
|vo_02_01_tl         = Good and evil have to end up by weighing its weight.

|vo_02_02_title      = 잡담・운
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Luck of the Draw
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Luck of the Draw.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx         = 운이 대결의 승패를 결정지을 수는 있지. 하지만 그 영향이 계속되진 않아
|vo_02_02_rm         = Uni daegyeol-ui seungpaereul gyeoljeongjieul suneun itji. Hajiman geu yeonghyang-i gyesokdoejin ana
|vo_02_02_tl         = Luck can decide the winning and losing of a fight. But its effect doesn't continue.

|vo_02_03_title      = 잡담・의문
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Doubt
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Doubt.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx         = 나도 가끔은 분위기를 좀 풀어주고 싶은데, 어떤 농담을 해야 사람들을 웃길 수 있을지 영 감이 안 잡혀
|vo_02_03_rm         = Nado gakkeumeun bunwigireul jom pureojugo sipeunde, eotteon nongdameul haeya saramdeureul utgil su isseulji yeong gami an japhyeo
|vo_02_03_tl         = I sometimes want to loosen up the mood, but I don't know which jokes will make people laugh.

|vo_03_01_title      = 비가 올 때…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx         = 또 비가 오는군…
|vo_03_01_rm         = Tto biga oneungun...
|vo_03_01_tl         = It's raining again...

|vo_03_02_title      = 번개가 칠 때…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx         = 번개는 신이 인간에게 내리는 심판이라는 전설이 있어
|vo_03_02_rm         = Beongaeneun sini inganege naerineun simpaniraneun jeonseol-i isseo
|vo_03_02_tl         = There is a legend that says that lightning is a judgement to humans from God.

|vo_03_03_title      = 눈이 올 때…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx         = 난 눈 내린 후의 세상이 좋아. 조용하지만 쥐 죽은 듯이 고요한 건 아니잖아
|vo_03_03_rm         = Nan nun naerin huui sesang'i joa. Joyonghajiman jwi jugeun deusi goyohan geon anijana
|vo_03_03_tl         = I like the world after snow. It's quiet, but not still.

|vo_03_04_title      = 햇살이 좋을 때…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx         = 햇빛은 결국 모든 곳을 비출 거야
|vo_03_04_rm         = Haebicheun gyeolguk modeun goseul bichul geoya
|vo_03_04_tl         = The sunlight will eventually light up everywhere.

|vo_03_05_title      = 강풍이 불 때…
|vo_03_05_subtitle   = When the Wind Is Blowing
|vo_03_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Wind Is Blowing.ogg
|vo_03_05_tx         = 바람이 세니까… 조심해
|vo_03_05_rm         = Barami senikka... josimhae
|vo_03_05_tl         = The wind is strong... be careful.

|vo_03_06_title      = 사막에 있을 때…
|vo_03_06_subtitle   = In the Desert
|vo_03_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} In the Desert.ogg
|vo_03_06_tx         = 익숙한 풍경이야…
|vo_03_06_rm         = Iksukhan punggyeong'iya...
|vo_03_06_tl         = It's a familiar landscape...

|vo_04_01_title      = 아침 인사…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx         = 기운 내, 출발하자
|vo_04_01_rm         = Giun nae, chulbalhaja
|vo_04_01_tl         = Cheer up, let's depart.

|vo_04_02_title      = 점심 인사…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx         = 점심 준비할까? 미리 말해두는데, 맛은 보장 못해
|vo_04_02_rm         = Jeomsim junbihalkka? Miri malhaedununde, maseun bojang mothae
|vo_04_02_tl         = Should I prepare lunch? I'm telling you in advance, the taste cannot be guaranteed.

|vo_04_03_title      = 저녁 인사…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx         = 내가 했던 말 기억해? 밤에는 늘 위험이 도사리고 있으니 항상 경계해야 돼
|vo_04_03_rm         = Naega haetdeon mal gieokhae? Bameneun neul wiheom-i dosarigo isseuni hangsang gyeonggyehaeya dwae
|vo_04_03_tl         = Do you remember what I said? You always have to be aware since the night is always dangerous.

|vo_04_04_title      = 굿나잇…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx         = 좋은 밤이야. 근처에서 범죄자들이 활동하고 있으니 가서 처리해야겠어
|vo_04_04_rm         = Joeun bamiya. Geuncheoeseo beomjoejadeuri hwaldonghago isseuni gaseo cheorihaeyagesseo
|vo_04_04_tl         = Good night. Since criminals are being active near, I should go and handle them.

|vo_05_01_title      = 사이노 자신에 대해・하이개그
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Unfunny Jokes
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Unfunny Jokes.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx         = 사막을 지나던 한 여행자가 있었는데, 너무 목이 말라서 물 슬라임을 만나게 해달라고 기도했어. 그런데 마침 배가 고팠던 물 슬라임도 혼자 다니는 여행자를 만나게 해달라고 기도하고 있었던 거야. 응? 표정이 왜 그래, 재미없어?
|vo_05_01_rm         = Samageul jinadeon han yeohaengjaga isseotneunde, neomu mogi mallaseo mul seullaimeul mannage haedallago gidohaesseo. Geureonde machim baega gopatdeon mul seullaimdo honja danineun yeohaengjareul mannage haedallago gidohago isseotdeon geoya. Eung? Pyojeong-i wae geurae, jaemieopsseo?
|vo_05_01_tl         = There was a traveler who was passing the desert, and they prayed to meet a water slime since they were too thirsty. But then, the hungry water slime was also praying to meet a lone traveler. Hmm? Why is your expression like that, is it not fun?

|vo_05_02_title      = 사이노 자신에 대해・산책
|vo_05_02_friendship = 4
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Desert Strolls
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Desert Strolls.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx         = 가끔 밤에 사막을 산책하곤 해. 차갑고 메마른 바람이 머리를 맑게 해주거든
|vo_05_02_rm         = Gakkeum bame samageul sanchaekhagon hae. Chagapgo memareun baram-i meorireul malkke haejugeodeun
|vo_05_02_tl         = I sometimes take a walk in the desert at night. The cold and dry wind clears my head.

|vo_06_01_title      = 우리에 대해・결투
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: [[TCG]] Duel
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - TCG Duel.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx         = 나랑 「일곱 성인의 소환」 한 판 할래? 이번에 새로 짠 덱을 보여줄게
|vo_06_01_rm         = Narang "Ilgop Seongin-ui Sohwan" han pan hallae? Ibeone saero jjan degeul boyeojulge
|vo_06_01_tl         = Do you want to have a round of "Summoning of the Seven Saints" with me? I'll show you a new deck I made.

|vo_06_02_title      = 우리에 대해・지금 이 순간
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: The Present
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - The Present.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx         = 과거는 돌이킬 수 없고 미래는 예측할 수 없으니, 난 이 순간을 소중히 여기고 있어
|vo_06_02_rm         = Gwageoneun dorikil su eopkko miraeneun yecheukhal su eopsseuni, nan i sunganeul sojunghi yeogigo isseo
|vo_06_02_tl         = The past cannot be undone, and the future is unpredictable, so I am cherishing this moment.

|vo_07_01_title      = 「신의 눈」에 대해…
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx         = 내 몸에 깃들어 있는 사람이 아닌 존재와 나에게 향한 마신의 눈길은 모두 내가 신의 총애를 받고 있다는 걸 보여주지. 하지만 난 내 신념을 바꿀 생각은 없어. 그저 책임을 다해 내가 해야 할 일을 해나갈 거야
|vo_07_01_rm         = Nae mome gitdeureo inneun saram-i anin jonjaewa naege hyanghan masin-ui nungireul modu naega sin-ui chong'aereul batgo itdaneun geol boyeojuji. Hajiman nan nae sinnyeomeul bakkul saenggageun eopsseo. Geujeo chaegimeul dahae naega haeya hal ireul haenagal geoya
|vo_07_01_tl         = The inhuman creature inside my body, and the attention of the God towards me all shows that I am a favorite of God. But I have no thoughts to change my belief. I will do what I have to do and carry out my duty to the fullest.

|vo_07_02_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기・지식욕(知識欲)
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share: Lust for Knowledge
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Lust for Knowledge.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx         = 「지나친 욕망은 재앙을 불러일으킨다」라는 말은 누구나 알고 있어. 하지만 「지식욕」에 대해선 다들 좋은 면만 논하려고 하지…. 난 그것도 일종의 욕망이니 반드시 통제해야 한다고 생각해
|vo_07_02_rm         = "Jinachin yokmang'eul jaeang'eul bulleoireukinda"raneun mareun nuguna algo isseo. Hajiman "Jisikyok"e daehaeseo dadeul joeun myeonman nonharyeogo haji... Nan geugeotdo iljong-ui yokmang'ini bandeusi tongjehaeya handago saenggakhae
|vo_07_02_tl         = Everyone knows the words that "Excessive desire brings a catastrophe". But people always try to talk good things about the "Thirst for Knowledge"... I think it should be restricted since it is also a kind of desire.

|vo_07_03_title      = 하고 싶은 이야기・경외심
|vo_07_03_friendship = 4
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Something to Share: Solemn Respect
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Solemn Respect.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx         = 임무를 수행할 땐 내가 내린 판단 하나가 다른 사람의 운명을 완전히 바꿔버릴 수도 있어. 그래서 「풍기관」이라는 이 직업에 대한 경외감을 유지하려고 노력 중이지. 내가 지식과 힘을 대할 때처럼…
|vo_07_03_rm         = Immureul suhaenghal ttaen naega naerin pandan hanaga dareun saram-ui unmyeong'eul wanjeonhi bakkwobeoril sudo isseo. Geuraeseo "Punggigwan"iraneun i jigeobe daehan gyeong'oegameul yujiharyeogo noryeok jung'iji. Naega jisikgwa himeul daehal ttaecheoreom...
|vo_07_03_tl         = When I go under tasks, one judgement from me can completely change someone's fate. So I am trying to keep a sense of awe on this job called "Matra". Just as how I look at knowledge and power...

|vo_07_04_title      = 흥미있는 일…
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx         = 난 사막에서 자라는 관목이 좋아. 사막은 죽음의 상징이고, 모든 문명은 모래바람에 덮여버리지. 하지만 이 황량한 땅에도 싹을 틔우고 살아가는 생명이 있어. 가끔은 이들의 강인함에 나도 놀라고는 해
|vo_07_04_rm         = Nan samageseo jaraneun gwanmok-i joa. Samageun jugeum-ui sangjing'igo, modeun munmyeong'eun moraebarame deopyeobeoriji. Hajiman i hwangryanghan ttang'edo ssageul tuiugo saraganeun saengmyeong-i isseo. Gakkeumeun ideurui gang'inhame nado nollagoneun hae
|vo_07_04_tl         = I like the shrubs that grow in the desert. The desert is a symbol of death, and all civilizations get covered by sandstorms. But in this barren land, there is life that sprouts and continues to live. I myself am sometimes startled by their toughness.

|vo_08_01_title      = 타이나리에 대해・지식
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Tighnari]]: Knowledge
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Tighnari - Knowledge.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx         = 타이나리는 내가 봤던 다른 학자와는 달라. 그 역시 다른 학자들처럼 지식을 갈망하지만, 절대 선을 넘지 않지. 어떤 학자들은 자신을 「실험실의 신」이라고 생각하지만, 타이나리는 그렇지 않아. 그는 모든 생명을 똑같이 존중해. 그가 아카데미아의 초빙을 거절했다는 얘길 들었을 때 나도 그의 편에 섰어
|vo_08_01_rm         = Tainarineun naega bwatdeon dareun hakjawaneun dalla. Geu yeoksi dareun hakjadeulcheoreom jisigeul galmanghajiman, jeoldae seoneul neomji anchi. Eotteon hakjadeureun jasineul "Silheomsil-ui Sin"irago saenggakhajiman, Tainarineun geureochi ana. Geuneun modeun saengmyeong'eul ttokgachi jonjunghae. Geuga Akademia-ui chobing'eul geojeolhaetdaneun yaegil deureosseul ttae nado geu-ui pyeone seosseo
|vo_08_01_tl         = Tighnari is different from the other scholars I have met. He also wants knowledge like the others, but he never crosses the line. Some scholars think that they are the "God of the Labatory", but Tighnari doesn't. He respects all lives as the same. When I heard that he rejected the invitation of the Akademiya, I stood on his side as well.

|vo_08_02_title      = 타이나리에 대해・농담
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About Tighnari: Jokes
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Tighnari - Jokes.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx         = 예전에 타이나리가 밥 먹을 땐 농담하지 말라고 한 적이 있어. 하나도 안 웃기다면서 말이야. 난 그 충고를 한 귀로 흘린 뒤, 꾹꾹 눌러 참았던 농담 세 개를 연거푸 했어. 이게 왜 웃긴 건지 설명까지 다 끝내고 나니까… 밥이 벌써 다 식었더라고…
|vo_08_02_rm         = Yejeone Tainariga bap meogeul ttaen nongdamhaji mallago han jeogi isseo. Hanado an utgidamyeonseo mariya. Nan geu chunggoreul han gwiro heullindwi, kkukkuk nulleo chamatdeon nongdam se gaereul yeongeopu haesseo. Ige wae utgin geonji seolmyeongkkaji da kkeutnaego nanikka... babi beolsseo da sigeotdeorago...
|vo_08_02_tl         = Some time ago, Tighnari told me not to make jokes when eating, saying that it's not fun at all. I didn't take attention to the advice, and said three jokes that I have been waiting to do in a row. After finishing explaning why they were fun... the food already became cold...

|vo_08_03_title      = 콜레이에 대해…
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Collei]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Collei.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx         = 전에 그 애 몸속에 있는 마신의 잔해를 봉인해줬는데, 봉인 과정이 엄청난 고통을 준 모양이야. 그때의 고통은 죽음보다 더 무서웠을지도 몰라. 하지만 콜레이는 그걸 견뎌냈지. 정말 대단해
|vo_08_03_rm         = Jeone ge ae moksoge inneun masin-ui janhaereul bong'inhaejwotneunde, bong'in gwajeong-i eomcheongnan gotong'eul jun moyang'iya. Geuttae-ui gotong'eun jugeumboda deo museowosseuljido molla. Hajiman Kolleineun geugeol gyeondyeonaetji. Jeongmal daedanhae
|vo_08_03_tl         = I sealed the remnants of a God inside her body some time ago, and it seemed like the sealing progress gave her lots of pain. The pain at that time might have been scarier than death. But Collei endured that. She's very impressing.

|vo_08_04_title      = 알하이탐에 대해…
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_quest      = King Deshret and the Three Magi
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Alhaitham]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Alhaitham.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx         = 난 너무 똑똑한 사람을 그리 좋아하지 않아. 이들은 자신이 뭐든 통제할 수 있다고 생각해서 종종 위험한 일을 벌이곤 하거든. 그래도 알하이탐은 상대적으로 안정적인 편이라 대부분의 상황을 통제하고 위험을 가라앉힐 능력이 있어
|vo_08_04_rm         = Nan neomu ttokttokhan sarameul geuri joahaji ana. Ideureun jasini mwodeun tongjehal su itdago saenggakhaeseo jongjong wiheomhan ireul beorigon hageodeun. Geuraedo Alhaitameun sangdaejeogeuro anjeongjeogin pyeonira daebubun-ui sanghwang'eul tongjehago wiheomeul garaanchil neungryeogi isseo
|vo_08_04_tl         = I don't like people who are too smart. They think that they can control anything, so they often do dangerous things. However, Alhaitham is comparably stable, so he has the abilities to control most situations and allay danger.

|vo_08_05_title      = 카베에 대해…
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Kaveh]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kaveh.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx         = 타이나리와 콜레이가 직접 말한 건 아니지만, 그들이 교환한 눈빛이 모든 걸 설명했어. 카베의 경험담이 내가 준비한 농담보다 훨씬 재미있었다는 거겠지. 내 생각은 어떠냐고? 난 그런 이야기를 듣고 웃을 수 있다는 사실이 더 웃긴 것 같은데
|vo_08_05_rm         = Tainariwa Kolleiga jikjeop malhan geon anijiman, geudeuri gyohwanhan nunbichi modeun geol seolmyeonghaesseo. Kabe-ui gyeongheomdami naega junbihan nongdamboda hwolssin jaemiisseotdaneun geogejji. Nae saenggageun eotteomyago? Nan geureon iyagireul deutgo useul su itdaneun sasiri deo utgin geot gateunde
|vo_08_05_tl         = Tighnari and Collei didn't directly say it, but the looks they exchanged explained everything. Kaveh's experiences must have been way funnier than the jokes I prepared. My thoughts about it? I think the fact that people can laugh at those stories are funnier.

|vo_08_06_title      = 나히다에 대해…
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Nahida]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Nahida.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx         = 신을 평가한다는 건… 내 생각엔 좀 주제넘는 일이야. 하지만 함께하는 동안 그녀의 지혜와 용기, 그리고 결심을 직접 확인하기도 했지. 억측으로만 그녀를 손가락질하는 현자보다는 내가 이런 평가를 내릴 자격이 있을 것 같네. 그녀는 뛰어나고 존경할 만한 신이라고
|vo_08_06_rm         = Sineul pyeonggahandaneun geun... nae saenggagen jom jujeneomneun iriya. Hajiman hamkkehaneun dong'an geunyeo-ui jihyewa yonggi, geurigo gyeolsimeul jikjeop hwaginhagido haetji. Eokcheugeuroman geunyeoreul songarakjilhaneun hyeonjabodaneun naega ireon pyeonggareul naeril jagyeok-i isseul geot ganne. Geunyeoneun ttwieonago jongyeonghal manhan sinirago
|vo_08_06_tl         = To evaluate a God... is something that crosses the line to me. But while being with her, I saw her wisdom, courage, and determination by myself. Compared to a sage that blames her with false speculations, I must have more rights to give her this kind of evaluation. That she is an excellent and respectable God.

|vo_08_07_title      = 닐루에 대해…
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_quest      = Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Nilou]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Nilou.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx         = 그녀에게선 춤에 대한 열정과 의지가 느껴져. 워낙 굳은 의지라 쉽게 변하진 않을 거야. 앞으로도 자신이 사랑해 마다치 않는 춤으로 다른 사람들에게 기쁨을 가져다주었으면 해
|vo_08_07_rm         = Geunyeoegeseon chume daehan yeoljeonggwa uijiga neukkyeojyeo. Wonak gudeun uijira swipge byeonhajin anneul geoya. Apeurodo jasini saranghae madachi anneun chumeuro dareun saramdeurege gippeumeul gajyeodajueosseumyeon hae
|vo_08_07_tl         = I can feel the passion and will for dancing from her. It's such a strong will that it won't change easily. I hope she can bring happiness to others by the dance she loves very much.

|vo_08_08_title      = 파루잔에 대해…
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Faruzan]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Faruzan.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx         = 전에 파루잔 선배의 실종을 기록한 문서를 봤어. 그땐 선배가 모종의 위험한 연구를 하는 건 아닐까 생각했는데… 직접 만나고 나니, 의심이 말끔히 사라졌지. 어울리기 쉬운 편은 아니지만, 타인을 위해 입에 잔소리를 달고 사는 선배였어. 선을 넘는 일은 하지 않을 거야
|vo_08_08_rm         = Jeone Parujan seonbae-ui siljong'eul girokhan munseoreul bwasseo. Geuttaen seonbaega mojong'ui wiheomhan yeongureul haneun geon anilkka saenggakhaenneunde... jikjeop mannago nani, uisim-i malkkeumhi sarajyeotji. Eoulligi swiun pyeoneun anijiman, taineul wihae ibe jansorireul dalgo saneun seonbaeyeosseo. Seoneul neomneun ireun haji anneul geoya.
|vo_08_08_tl         = I saw a document that wrote about senior Faruzan's disappearance. I thought that she might be doing some dangerous research... but after seeing her in person, my doubts completely disappeared. She's not easy to get along with, but she was a senior who nagged others for their good. She won't do something that crosses the line.

|vo_08_09_title      = 리사에 대해…
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx         = 나와 리사는 같은 현자에게 가르침을 구한 적이 있어서 자연스럽게 그녀에 대해 알게 됐어. 대풍기관으로서 나 역시 과도한 지식욕(知識欲)으로 인해 비극적인 결말을 맞는 경우를 여러 차례 봤기 때문에, 그녀의 선택을 이해할 수 있었지
|vo_08_09_rm         = Nawa Risaneun gateun hyeonjaege gareuchimeul guhan jeogi isseoseo jayeonseureopge geunyeoe daehae alge dwaesseo. Daepunggigwaneurosseo na yeoksi gwadohan jisikyogeuro inhae bigeukjeogin gyeolmareul matneun gyeong'ureul yeoreo charye bwatgi ttaemune, geunyeo-ui seontaegeul ihaehal su isseotji
|vo_08_09_tl         = Me and Lisa have sought teachings from the same sage, so I naturally got to know about her. As the Genearl Mahamatra, I have seen many cases of tragic endings due to excessive thirst for knowledge, so I could understand her choice.

|vo_09_01_title      = 사이노에 대해 알기・첫 번째
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx         = 나에 대해서 알려달라고? 하긴, 다른 사람들이 보기에 난 무시할 수 없는 「귀찮은 존재」니까…. 걱정 마, 네가 위험한 일을 하지 않는 이상, 널 귀찮게 굴 일은 없을 거야
|vo_09_01_rm         = Nae daehaeseo allyeodallago? Hagin, dareun saramdeuri bogie nan musihal su eomneun "Gwichaneun Jonjae"nikka... Geokjeong ma, nega wiheomhan ireul haji anneun isang, neol gwichanke gul ireun eopsseul geoya
|vo_09_01_tl         = You want me to tell you about myself? Well, as other see, I am a "Bothersome Existence" that couldn't be ignored... Don't worry, as long as you don't do something dangerous, I won't bother you.

|vo_09_02_title      = 사이노에 대해 알기・두 번째
|vo_09_02_friendship = 3
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx         = 내 몸을 그릇으로 삼아 사람이 아닌 존재의 힘을 발현할 수 있어. 타고난 체질 덕이기도 하지만, 후천적인 거래 덕이기도 해. 내가 풍기관의 신분으로 세간의 죄악을 심판할 땐, 자연히 나 자신의 영혼 역시 심판의 저울에 오르게 되지
|vo_09_02_rm         = Nae momeul geureuseuro sama sarami anin jonjae-ui himeul balhyeonhal su isseo. Tagonan chejil deogigido hajiman, hucheonjeogin georae deogigido hae. Nae punggigwan-ui sinbuneuro segan-ui joeageul simpanhal ttaen, jayeonhi na jasin-ui yeonghon yeoksi simpan-ui jeoure oreuge doeji
|vo_09_02_tl         = I can manifest the power of something that isn't human with my body as the container. It's because of my innate condition, but also because of an acquired trade. When I judge the sins of the world as a matra, my soul naturally gets on the scale of judgement.

|vo_09_03_title      = 사이노에 대해 알기・세 번째
|vo_09_03_friendship = 4
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx         = 난 「왜」보다 「무엇」을 했느냐를 더 중요시해. 이 세상엔 수천만 가지의 이유가 존재하잖아. 그 이유를 들으면 잘못한 사람을 오히려 이해하게 되고, 다른 사람들이 너무하다는 생각까지 들 때도 있어. 측은지심은 약자 쪽으로 기울기 마련이지만, 심판자는 그런 마음을 버려야 해. 이유는 들어볼 수 있지만, 죄는 용서할 수 없어
|vo_09_03_rm         = Nan "Wae"boda "Mueot"eul haetneunyareul deo jung'yosihae. I sesang'en sucheonman gaji-ui iyuga jonjaehajana. Geu iyureul deureumyeon jalmothan sarameul ohiryeo ihaehage doego, dareun saramdeuri neomuhadaneun saenggak'kkajideul ttaedo isseo. Cheugeunjisimeun yakja jjogeuro giulgi maryeonijiman, simpanjaneun geureon maeumeul beoryeoya hae. Iyuneun deoreobol su itjiman, joeneun yongseohal su eopsseo
|vo_09_03_tl         = I think "What" someone did is more important than "Why". There are millions of reasons in this world. If I listen to those reasons, I get to understand the person who did wrong, and sometimes think that the others went too much. Pity tends to lean towards the weak, but a judge should stop thinking like that. I can listen the reason, but I cannot forgive the sin.

|vo_09_04_title      = 사이노에 대해 알기・네 번째
|vo_09_04_friendship = 5
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx         = 캄캄한 무지의 바다에서 이따금 희미한 빛이 떠올라 진실을 알지 못하는 자들을 유혹하곤 해. 그 아래, 칠흑 같은 바닷속에 거대한 위험이 도사리고 있는 것도 모르고 그걸 등대로 착각하는 사람들이 많지. 오랫동안 어둠 속에 있던 사람을 빛으로 이끄는 건 잔인한 일이지만, 우리가 바닷속에 숨은 적을 쓰러뜨릴 수 있을 때까지 난 멈출 수 없어
|vo_09_04_rm         = Kamkamhan muji-ui badaeseo ittageum huimihan bichi tteoolla jinsireul alji mothaneun jadeureul yuhokhagon hae. Geu are, chilheuk gateun badatsoge geodaehan wiheomi dosarigo inneun geotdo moreugo geugeol deungdaero chakgakhaneun saramdeuri manchi. Oraetdong'an eodum soge itdeon sarameul bicheuro ikkeuneun geon janinhan irijiman, uriga badatsoge sumeun jeogeul sseureotteuril su isseul ttaekkaji nan meomchul su eopsseo
|vo_09_04_tl         = Sometimes a faint light rises in the dark sea of ignorance, attracting those who do not know the truth. There are many people who mistake it as a lighthouse without knowing that there is a huge danger lurking under the pitch-black sea. It's cruel to lead someone who's been in the dark for a long time to the light, but I can't stop until we knock down an enemy hidden in the sea.

|vo_09_05_title      = 사이노에 대해 알기・다섯 번째
|vo_09_05_friendship = 6
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx         = 내가 가치 있다고 판단한 정보는 이미 다 알려줬는데, 내가 무슨 말을 더 하길 기대하는 거야? 하… 네 호기심도 정말 보통은 아니구나. 그럼 네가 직접 질문해 봐. 다른 사람을 심문해오던 내가 질문을 받는 느낌도… 신선할 것 같으니
|vo_09_05_rm         = Naega gachi itdago pandanhan jeongboneun imi da allyeojwotneunde, naega museun mareul deo hagil gidaehaneun geoya? Ha... ne hogisimdo jeongmal botong'eun aniguna. Geureom nega jikjeop jilmunhae bwa. Dareun sarameul simmunhaeodeon naega jilmuneul batneun neukkimdo... sinseonhal geot gateuni
|vo_09_05_tl         = I've already given you all the information I found valuable, what more do you expect me to say? Ha... your curiosity is really out of the ordinary. Then you ask yourself a question. I feel like it will give me a fresh feeling to... be questioned when I've always been questioning someone else.

|vo_10_01_title      = 사이노의 취미…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx         = 시간 있을 땐 다른 사람들이랑 「일곱 성인의 소환」을 해. 규칙과 융통성이 공존하는 이런 게임은… 나에겐 일종의 예술이야
|vo_10_01_rm         = Sigan isseul ttaen dareun saramdeurirang "Ilgop Seong'in-ui Sohwan"eul hae. Gyuchikgwa yungtongseong-i gongjonhaneun ireon geimeun... naegen iljong-ui yesuriya
|vo_10_01_tl         = When I have time, I play "Summoning of the Seven Saints" with others. A game with rules and flexibility coexisting... is a sort of art to me.

|vo_10_02_title      = 사이노의 고민…
|vo_10_02_friendship = 6
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx         = 얼마 전에 이나즈마의 한 라이트 노벨을 봤어. 「일곱 성인의 소환」을 주제로 한 이야기였는데, 주인공이 곤경에 처했을 때 갑자기 덱에 존재하지 않던 카드를 뽑더라고. 엄청 충격적이었던 동시에 이런 의문이 생겼지. 덱에 특수 조작을 했다면, 이는 규칙을 깨뜨린 걸까, 아니면 규칙의 일부인 걸까?
|vo_10_02_rm         = Eolma jeome Inajeuma-ui han raiteu nobereul bwasseo. "Ilgop Seong'in-ui Sohwan"eul jujero han iyagiyeotneunde, juingong-i gongyeong'e cheoheasseul ttae gapjagi dege jonjaehaji anteon kadeureul ppopdeorago. Eomcheong chunggyeokjeogieotdeon dongsie ireon uimuni saenggyeotji. Dege teuksu jojageul haetdamyeon, ineun gyuchigeul kkaetteurin geolkka, animyeon gyuchik-ui ilbuin geolkka?
|vo_10_02_tl         = A while ago, I saw a light novel from Inazuma. It was a story themed of "Summoning of Seven Saints", and the main character used a card that didn't exist in the deck when he was in vain. It was very shocking, but it also gave me a question. If they specially manipulated the deck, would it be breaking the rules, or a part of the rules?

|vo_10_03_title      = 좋아하는 음식…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx         = 쌀, 고기, 말린 과일을 섞은 뒤 요거트를 넣고 구우면 다양한 맛이 골고루 섞여. 바삭한 껍데기를 벗기고 나면, 뜨거운 김과 함께 향긋한 냄새가 퍼져 나오지. 만드는 데 오래 걸리지도 않아서 내가 아주 좋아하는 음식이야
|vo_10_03_rm         = Ssal, gogi, mallin gwaireul seokkeun dwi yogeoteureul neotgo guumyeon dayanghan masi golgoru seokkyeo. Basakhan kkeopdegireul beotgigo namyeon, tteugeoun gimgwa hamkke hyanggeuthan naemsaega peojyeo naoji. Mandeuneun de orae geollijido anaseo naega aju joahaneun eumsigiya
|vo_10_03_tl         = Mix rice, meat, and dried fruits, add yogurt, and if you bake them, various flavors are mixed. After peeling off the crispy cover, a fragrant smell spreads out with hot steam. It doesn't take too long to make, so it's my favorite food.

|vo_10_04_title      = 싫어하는 음식…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx         = 사막을 지날 때 가지고 다니는 식량은 보통 딱딱하고 아무 맛도 안 나서, 익숙해지면 거의 못 먹는 게 없을 정도야. 굳이 하나 꼽자면 벌레랑 관련된 음식은 좀 거부감이 있긴 해…
|vo_10_04_rm         = Samageul jinal ttae gajigo danineun sikryang'eul botong ttakttakhago amu matdo an naseo, iksukhaejimyeon geoui mot meokneun ge eopsseul jeongdoya. Guji hana kkopjamyeon beollerang gwanryeondoen eumsigeul jom geobugami itgin hae...
|vo_10_04_tl         = The food I carry around when passing through the desert is usually hard and tasteless, so I can eat almost anything when I get used to it. If I have to choose one, I am a bit reluctant to eat food related to insects...

|vo_10_05_title      = 선물 획득・첫 번째
|vo_10_05_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_10_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_10_05_tx         = 정말 맛있어. 신경 써줘서 고마워
|vo_10_05_rm         = Jeongmal masisseo. Singyeong sseojwoseo gomawo
|vo_10_05_tl         = It's really delicious. Thanks for taking care.

|vo_10_06_title      = 선물 획득・두 번째
|vo_10_06_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_10_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_10_06_tx         = 잘 받을게. 고마워
|vo_10_06_rm         = Jal badeulge. Gomawo
|vo_10_06_tl         = Thank you.

|vo_10_07_title      = 선물 획득・세 번째
|vo_10_07_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_10_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_10_07_tx         = 나한테 주는 거라고? 뭔가 착각한 거 아니야?
|vo_10_07_rm         = Nahante juneun georago? Mwonga chakgakhan geo aniya?
|vo_10_07_tl         = You're giving this to me? Did you confuse something?

|vo_11_01_title      = 생일…
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx         = 음… 우선 생일 축하해. 이런 걸 축하해 본 경험은 별로 없지만, 네 생일인 게 생각나서 미리 준비를 좀 했지. 먼저 내가 며칠간의 연구를 통해 짜낸 덱인데 스타일도 너랑 잘 맞을 거야. 그리고 요 며칠 동안의 스케줄을 정리해 봤어. 어디 가고 싶은 데 있으면 같이 갈게. 생일은 하루뿐이지만, 제대로 즐기는 게 중요하니 사흘 이내로 다녀오기만 하면 돼
|vo_11_01_rm         = Eum... useon saeng'il chukhahae. Ireon geol chukhahae bon gyeongheomeun byeollo eopjjiman, ne saeng'irin ge saenggaknaseo miri junbireul jom haetji. Meonjeo naega myeochilgan-ui yeongureul tonghae jjanaen deginde seutaildo neorang jal majeul geoya. Geurigo yo myeochil dong'an-ui seukejureul jeongrihae bwasseo. Eodi gago sipeun de isseumyeon gachi galkke. Saeng'ireul haruppunijiman, jedaero jeulgineun ge jung'yohani saheul inaero danyeoogiman hamyeon dwae
|vo_11_01_tl         = Hmm... first, happy birthday. I don't have many experiences of celebrating these, but I prepared a few things since I remembered it was your birthday. First, this is a deck I made with a few days of research, the style will fit you well. Also, I organized my schedules for a few days. I'll go with you if you want to go somewhere. A birthday is only one day, but it's important to fully enjoy, so we only have to return in three days.

|vo_12_01_title      = 돌파의 느낌・기
|vo_12_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx         = 새로운 힘이 느껴져. 아마 강해졌다는 증거겠지
|vo_12_01_rm         = Saeroun himi neukkyeojyeo. Ama ganghaejyeodaneun jeunggeogejji
|vo_12_01_tl         = I feel a new power. It's probably the evidence of me getting stronger.

|vo_12_02_title      = 돌파의 느낌・승
|vo_12_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_12_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_12_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_12_02_tx         = 악을 심판하고 규칙을 수호하리
|vo_12_02_rm         = Ageul simpanhago gyuchigeul suhohari
|vo_12_02_tl         = Evil shall be judged, and the rules shall be protected.

|vo_12_03_title      = 돌파의 느낌・전
|vo_12_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_12_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_12_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_12_03_tx         = 좋은 성장이군. 정말 고마워
|vo_12_03_rm         = Joeun seongjang'igun. Jeongmal gomawo
|vo_12_03_tl         = It's a good growth. Thank you so much.

|vo_12_04_title      = 돌파의 느낌・결
|vo_12_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_12_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_12_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_12_04_tx         = 힘은 이미 최고조에 달했지만, 무력만으로는 아직 해낼 수 없는 것투성이야. 인정과 규칙은 충돌할 때가 많아. 어떻게 해야 이 둘을 고려할 수 있을지에 대한 답은 앞으로의 여정에서 찾아낼 거야
|vo_12_04_rm         = Himeun imi choegojoe dalhaetjjiman, muryeokmaneuroneun ajik haenael su eomneun geot'tuseong'iya. Injeonggwa gyuchigeun chungdolhal ttaega mana. Eotteoke haeya i dureul goryeohal su isseuljie daehan dabeun apeuro-ui yeojeong'eseo chajanael geoya
|vo_12_04_tl         = My power is at is highest, but there are too many things I cannot complete with only power. Compassion and rules clash a lot. The answer on how to consider both of them will be found from the journeys I will go through in the future.
}}
